text: Guft (Şu'ajʙ): Ej qavmi man, ojo qaʙilai man dar nazdi şumo az Allohi ʙarhaq ʙolotaru giromitar ast? Ojo Allohro puşti sar qaror medihed va az Ū nametarsed va qudratu izzati Vajro ʙuzurg namedored? Hol on ki Parvardigori man ʙar har kore, ki mekuned, onro ihota dorad. Hamai amalhoi ʙandagonaşro medonad va muvofiqi on çazo medihad
